Add.summary: Creates and adds the column object to the list.
Add.param: The data source data type name.

Columns.summary: Gets the column objects that match the property names.
Columns.param: The data object property names array.

GetIndex.summary: Gets the column object with the supplied property name.

Remove.summary: Removes the column object with the supplied property name.

Retrieve.summary: Retrieves the column object with the supplied property name.

RetrieveWithIndex.summary: Retrieves the column object at the supplied index.
